doc:
Judy Parfitt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Judy_Parfitt 0 Judy Catherine Claire Parfitt (born 7 November 1935) is an English theatre, film and television actress. She made her film debut in a minor supporting part in Information Received (1961), followed by supporting role in the BBC television serial David Copperfield (1966). She also appeared as Queen Gertrude in Tony Richardson's 1969 film adaptation of Hamlet. Later credits include as Vera Donovan in the Stephen King film adaptation of Dolores Claiborne (1995), and in Girl with a Pearl Earring (2003), the latter for which she earned a BAFTA nomination for Best Supporting Actress. Beginning in 2012, Parfitt has starred on the drama series Call the Midwife as Sister Monica Joan. Judy_Catherine_Claire_Parfitt ( born_7_November_1935 ) is an_English_theatre_,_film_and_television_actress . She made her_film_debut in a_minor_supporting_part in Information_Received_(_1961_) , followed by supporting_role in the_BBC_television_serial_David_Copperfield_(_1966_) . She also appeared as Queen_Gertrude in Tony_Richardson 's 1969_film adaptation of Hamlet . Later credits include as Vera_Donovan in the_Stephen_King_film_adaptation of Dolores_Claiborne_(_1995_) , and in Girl with a_Pearl_Earring_(_2003_) , the_latter for which she earned a_BAFTA_nomination for Best_Supporting_Actress . Beginning in 2012 , Parfitt has_starred on the_drama_series Call the_Midwife as Sister_Monica_Joan .
